metadata.name: Richard Harris

persona.name: Hannah Lee
persona.role: Existing customer, moving coordinator for a nonprofit (change of address)
persona.goal: Move service to a new business address and schedule a callback appointment
persona.context: Office relocation next month; needs continuity of phone/internet; wants to confirm new address coverage

intent.name: Explore Ethernet/Dedicated Connectivity
intent.description: A new lead asks about Ethernet or higher-reliability connectivity options for business use.
intent.goal: Capture contact and location details and schedule a specialized sales callback.
intent.initialMessage: We need something more reliable than regular broadband—do you offer business ethernet?

emotion.name: Curious
emotion.description: Asks exploratory questions, requests options and comparisons, uses phrases like “what are my options?” or “can you tell me more?”

metadata.outcome: Callback window provided so the agent can schedule a Business Class appointment.

turns.content: We need something more reliable than regular broadband—do you offer business ethernet?
We offer Ethernet Dedicated Internet for businesses. Could I get your name to set up a call with a Business Class agent?

messages: We offer Ethernet Dedicated Internet for businesses. Could I get your name to set up a call with a Business Class agent?

turns.content:
Sure, my name is Hannah Lee.  

Before we set up the call, can you also confirm whether your Ethernet Dedicated Internet is available at our new office address?
I can check that for you—what’s the street address of your new office? Once we have it, I’ll set up a call with a Business Class agent.

messages: I can check that for you—what’s the street address of your new office? Once we have it, I’ll set up a call with a Business Class agent.

usedTools.toolOutput: {"error":"GraphQL request failed. Status: 401, StatusText: Unauthorized. Response: {\"errors\":[{\"message\":\"X-Tenant-Global-ID: header must be a properly formatted GlobalID string; got \\\"unknown\\\"\",\"extensions\":{\"code\":\"UNAUTHORIZED\"}}]}"}

turns.content:
The new address is 1840 Willow Creek Plaza, Suite 320, Austin, TX 78758.  

Once you check availability, can you tell me what my options might look like there—speeds, typical pricing ranges, and contract terms—before we book the call?

We’ll verify Ethernet Dedicated Internet at that location and then a Business Class agent can walk you through speeds, pricing and contract options. What date, time and timezone work best for a quick call?

messages: We’ll verify Ethernet Dedicated Internet at that location and then a Business Class agent can walk you through speeds, pricing and contract options. What date, time and timezone work best for a quick call?

turns.content:
Let’s do this Thursday at 11:00 AM Central Time for the call.  

If that slot isn’t available, anytime between 10 AM–1 PM Central on Thursday would work for me.
